question_prompt: Can receive and make phone calls
Notifies adult when injured or hurt
Can dial 911 in case of an emergency
Can perform simple first-aid: bandage, cold compress/ice
Follows safety rules when talking with strangers
Has stranger awareness when asked to leave a location with an unfamiliar person
Follows fire safety rules and knows family fire safety plan
Identifies the location of fire extinguishers
Knows the difference between putting out paper fires and grease fires
Knows natural disaster plan for their geographic area (tornado, earthquake)
Knows how to identify natural gas and identifies appropriate precautions
Identifies carbon monoxide detector and precautions
